name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
description: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Vermintide is a visually stunning and groundbreaking melee action game pushing the boundaries of the first person co-op genre. Join the fight now!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 65 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970/1060 or ATI Radeon R9 series DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 65 GB available space
